sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for thermal analysis using DSC or TGA analyzer.
sections.scope: Applicable to thermal analysis performed in the Central Instrumentation Facility.
procedure: Ensure the instrument is clean and properly calibrated.
Switch ON the DSC/TGA analyzer and associated software.
Weigh the sample accurately and place it in the sample pan.
Load the sample pan into the instrument.
Set the temperature program as per requirement.
Start the analysis and monitor the run.
After completion, save the data and remove the sample pan.
sections.precautions: Do not overload sample pans. Handle hot components carefully.
